briefTitle: Collaborative Care to Reduce Depression and Increase Cancer Screening Among Low-Income Urban Women
officialTitle: Collaborative Care to Reduce Depression and Increase Cancer Screening Among Low-Income Urban Women Project
conditions: Depression, Breast Cancer Screening, Cervical Cancer Screening, Colorectal Cancer Screening
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Assessment of Colorectal, Breast, and Cervical Cancer Screening Up to Date Status
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Resident of the Bronx
* Overdue for breast, cervical or colorectal cancer screening
* Screen positive for depression
* No cancer diagnosis within the past six months
